buildCommand: cd ../.. && corepack prepare pnpm@9.0.0 --activate && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile=false && cd packages/db && pnpm exec prisma generate && cd ../../apps/console && pnpm build
installCommand: corepack prepare pnpm@9.0.0 --activate && cd ../.. && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile=false --shamefully-hoist
